```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import altair as alt

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df):
    print(df.head())


def preview_data(df):
    # Get the first few rows of data
    head_data = df.head()
    
    # Create a histogram using altair
    histogram = alt.Chart(df).mark_bar().encode(
        x='Random Numbers',
        y='count()'
    )
    
    # Return a list containing the first few rows of the data and the histogram
    return [head_data, histogram]


preview_data(data)
```
